Key Match Events: Iran took the lead in the 24th minute when Mehdi Ghayedi slid a shot across the six-yard box and past the despairing grasp of goalkeeper Yapp Hung-fai, the ball nestling in the bottom-right corner.
Philip Chan sliced a gilt-edged opportunity after some haphazard Iran defending.
Yapp saved well from a Shahriyar Moghanloo header
Pre-Game Insights: Iran, among the favourites for the trophy as they hunt a record-equalling fourth continental crown, dominated possession.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hong Kong -- playing at their first Asian Cup in more than 55 years -- had opportunities early on, especially when Brazil-born forward Everton Camargo blazed over the bar from inside the box.
Iran progressed to the knockout rounds of the Asian Cup in a game of spurned chances for both teams.
Others: The match was played at the Khalifa International Stadium in Doha on January 19, 2024, in front of 36,412 spectators.
